Global Customer Committee News GCC Americas Face 2 Face Recap When the Americas Global Customer Committee (GCC) met Sept. 23-25, the group moved forward with prioritizing its Rolling Action Items List (RAIL), heard from Aerospace leadership, and discussed ways to promote Honeywell... Read More>>
NavDB Update When is a Special Navigation Database Required? An aircraft gets an update to the latest service bulletin and is now RNP capable. The question is; does it need an RNP database...Read More>>
Flight Management System Software Version 6.1 Upgrade Corner Aircraft Certification Update FMS Software Version 6.1, and the many new features and enhancements that come with it, is certified for the majority of eligible aircraft. The final remaining certifications are expected by the end of Q1, 2014...Read More>>
Global Data Center Update myGDC iPad App Tips and Tricks: Review Flight Plans and Filing Status The Honeywell Global Data Center has just released an iOS 7 compatible update to their popular iPad app. Take a tour on how to use the app to modify existing flight plans and update their status with ATC...Read More>>
Honeywell GoDirect Briefing RNAV Approach Procedure Naming Conventions - A Refresher GPS-based approach procedures are constantly being developed, adding accessibility and flexibility for operators. Additionally regulatory authorities are publishing multiple RNAV approach procedures to a single runway end...Read More>>
Events and Training 2013 Calendar of Events and Training Opportunities Honeywell Customer and Product Support pilots will be available at many events this year, including Honeywell Operators Conferences, online Webinars, and customer/industry events...Read More>>
